# Smart Ops Mobile Native - React Native CLI Project

This is a React Native CLI project (not Expo) that connects to the Smart Ops API.

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Scaffold React Native CLI project
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Configure API connection
- [ ] Create screens based on frontend design
- [ ] Test build
- [ ] Update documentation

## Tech Stack
- React Native CLI (TypeScript)
- React Navigation
- Axios for API calls
- API Base URL: https://smartsolutionfl.com/api

## Design Reference
Based on smart-ops-frontend design
